Title: Board Meeting Intimation for The Board Meeting To Be Held On Monday, November 02, 2020 & Notice Of Closure Of Trading Window Of The Company
Summary: Anant Raj Limited-$has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 02/11/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve and take on record the unaudited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2020.<BR> <BR> Further, in continuation of our earlier letter dated September 30, 2020, in compliance with the provisions of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, as amended and the Company's Code of Conduct for prevention of Insider Trading under the provision of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company had already been closed for the insiders covered under the code from October 01, 2020 till the expiry of 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2020 and the trading window shall re-open thereafter.

Title: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting For The 2Nd Quarter Ended September 30, 2020.
Summary: Ravindra Energy Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 02/11/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Pursuant to SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please take notice that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Monday, the 2nd day of November, 2020, inter alia, to consider, approve and take on records the Un-audited Financial Results for the second quarter ended September 30, 2020; <BR> <BR> Further, pursuant to the provisions of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 and the Company's Code of Practices and Procedures for Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company - Ravindra Energy Limited which is closed for the designated employees covered under the Code from October 1, 2020, shall continue to remain closed upto Wednesday, November 4, 2020.<BR>

Title: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Date Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Reg. 29 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 And Closure Of Trading Window
Summary: ZEN TECHNOLOGIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/10/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve This is to inform you that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Saturday, October 31st, 2020, inter-alia, to <BR> <BR> a. Consider and approve the unaudited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the second quarter & Half Year ended 30th September, 2020; and<BR> b. Consider and approve other corporate matters.<BR> <BR> As per the provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 read with the Code of Conduct to Regulate, Monitor and Report Trading by Insiders of the Company, the Trading Window for dealing in the equity shares of the Company was closed from 01 October 2020 till 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results for the second quarter & half year ended September 30, 2020, for all designated persons, their immediate relatives and all connected persons covered under the said Code. <BR> <BR> Accordingly, the trading window shall remain closed till Monday, November 02, 2020 and reopen on Tuesday, November 03, 2020.

Title: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting As Per Regulations 29 And 47 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
Summary: Godrej Agrovet Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/11/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Notice is hereby given pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of Godrej Agrovet Limited ('the Company') is scheduled to be held on Wednesday, November 4, 2020, to, inter alia, consider and approve and take on record the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2020, after these results are reviewed by the Audit Committee.<BR> <BR> In terms of Regulation 47 of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith copies of the Notices of the Board Meeting published in newspapers, viz., Business Standard and Financial Express (in English language) and Mumbai Lakshadeep and Loksatta (in Marathi language) today, i.e., on Saturday, October 24, 2020.<BR> <BR> Kindly take note of the above.

Title: Notice Of Extraordinary General Meeting Dated 17.11.2020
Summary: This is to inform you that an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) of the Company will be held on Tuesday, 17th November, 2020 through Video Conferencing [VC]/ Other Audio Visual Means [OAVM] without the physical presence of members at registered office.<BR> The remote e-voting period begins on November 14, 2020 at 9:00 A.M. and ends on November 16, 2020 at 05:00 P.M. The remote e-voting module shall be disabled by NSDL for voting thereafter <BR> Notice of Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) of the Company is being enclosed and same is also available on Company's website i.e. www.mnil.in <BR> This is for your kind information and record.<BR>

Title: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
Summary: In continuation to our Letter No. VEDL/Sec./SE/20-21/123 dated October 21, 2020 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company through resolution passed by circulation on Saturday, October 24, 2020 have approved First Interim Dividend of ₹ 9.50 per equity share i.e. 950 % on face value of Re. 1/- per share for the Financial Year 2020-21 amounting to c.₹ 3,500 Crores. The record date for the purpose of payment of dividend is Saturday, October 31, 2020. The interim dividend will be paid within stipulated timelines as prescribed under law. We request you to kindly take the above information on record.

Title: Board declares Interim Dividend
Summary: Supreme Petrochem Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on October 23, 2020, inter alia, has declared Interim Dividend of Rs.2.50/- per equity share of the Company for the Financial Year 2020-2021 on its paid up equity share capital (consisting of 94020671 equity shares of Rs. 10/- each) entailing an outgo of Rs.2350.52 Lakhs.

Title: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
Summary: Nestle India - The Board of Directors at their meeting held today declared interim dividend of Rs. 135/- (Rupees One Hundred Thirty Five only) per equity share of Rs. 10/- each for the year 2020 on the entire issued, subscribed and paid up share capital of the Company of 9,64,15,716 equity shares of the nominal value of Rs. 10/- each.<BR> <BR> The interim dividend for the year 2020 will be paid on and from 20th November 2020 to those members whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company and as beneficial owners in the Depositories, determined with reference to the Record Date of 2nd November 2020.

Title: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
Summary: Tech Mahindra declared Special dividend of Rs. 15/- per equity share of Rs. 5/- each i.e. 300% of the face value. The Dividend shall be paid on Thursday, 12 November, 2020, to the equity shareholders of the Company whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company or in the records of Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on Monday, 2"4 November, 2020, which is the Record Date fixed for the purpose.

Title: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
Summary: Notice is hereby given that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company (the "Board") scheduled to be held on Wednesday, October 28, 2020, it is proposed to consider and approve Special Dividend on equity shares, for the Financial Year 2020-21. Please note that the record date for the purpose of determining the entitlement of the equity shareholders for the said dividend, if declared, is being fixed as Thursday, November 5, 2020.

Title: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
Summary: We wish to inform you that Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held on Friday, October 23, 2020, has declared the Interim Dividend @ Rs. 2.5/- (25%) per Equity share for the financial year 2020-21.<BR> <BR> Please note that as per Regulation 42(1)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Wednesday, November 04, 2020 has been fixed as 'Record Date' for the purpose of payment of Interim Dividend.

Title: Board to consider Interim Dividend
Summary: With reference to the earlier letter dated September 30, 2020 regarding the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on October, 30, 2020 to approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone, Consolidated and Segment) of the Company for the third quarter ended September 30, 2020, In this connection, Rain Industries Ltd has now informed BSE that at the aforesaid Board of Directors Meeting scheduled on October, 30, 2020, the Board of Directors will also consider declaration of Interim Dividend on equity shares of the Company for the financial year ending December 31, 2020.

Title: Board to consider Interim Dividend
Summary: Emami Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on November 05, 2020 inter alia, to:<BR><BR>1. Consider the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2020 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors for the corresponding period;<BR><BR>2. Consider the proposal for declaration of an Interim Equity Dividend for the Financial Year 2020-21 (?Interim Dividend?).<BR><BR>In Company's letter dated September 29, 2020 the Company has already communicated closure of trading window of the Company from October 01, 2020 till the end of 48 hours after the declaration of financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2020. Consequently, the trading window will remain closed till November 07, 2020.

Title: Board declares Interim Dividend
Summary: Crompton Greaves Consumer Electricals Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors in their Meeting held on October 22, 2020, inter alia, have considered, approved and taken on record the following:- Declaration of interim dividend of Rs. 3/- (Rupees Three only) per share of Rs. 2/- each for the financial year 2020-21.

Title: Board to consider Interim Dividend
Summary: Indag Rubber Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on November 10, 2020, inter-alia, to consider :1. Financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2020 2. Interim dividend for the financial year 2020-2021.Further, in pursuance of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window was closed on October 01, 2020 and would remain closed till November 12, 2020 (both days inclusive).

Title: Board approves Bonus Issue
Summary: Vishal Fabrics Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on October 22, 2020, inter alia, has considered and approved the following:<BR><BR>- Bonus Issue of Equity Shares in the ratio of 1 :2 i.e., 1 (one) Bonus Equity Share of face value of Rs. 5/- each for every 2 (two) existing Equity Share of face value of Rs. 5/- each fully paid up, held by the shareholders in accordance with Articles<BR>of Association of the Company, subject to approval of members of the Company.

Title: Corporate Action-Board recommends Bonus Issue
Summary: Recommended for the issue of Bonus equity shares in the proportion of 1:4 i.e. 1 (One) new fully paid-up equity share of Rs. 5/- (Rupees Five only) each for every 4 (Four) existing fully paid-up equity share of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five only) each held by the members. Requisite details of Bonus issue are given in Annexure II.

Title: Corporate Action-Board recommends Bonus Issue
